name: Shepell
description: Morneau Shepell is one of the world’s largest Employee Assistance Programme (EAP) providers, supporting employees and their families across the globe to resolve work, health, and life challenges. Morneau Shepell serve more than 20,000 global organisations, supporting over 20 million individuals to improve their lives.
features: 24/7 assistance available through Phone, web, and mobile app
Innovative digital support tools for convenience
Local expert support and consultation, Short-term, solution-focused counselling and consulting services
Headline: Helps Starts Here
ShortDescription: Morneau Shepell is one of the world’s largest Employee Assistance Programme (EAP) providers.
enhanced_description: Morneau Shepell is a global leader in Employee Assistance Programs (EAPs), providing comprehensive support to employees and their families worldwide. With a reach of over 20,000 global organizations and supporting over 20 million individuals, the platform helps resolve work, health, and life challenges. It offers 24/7 assistance through phone, web, and a mobile app, complemented by innovative digital support tools and local expert-led, short-term, solution-focused counseling and consulting services. Its core objective is to improve employee happiness and engagement.
key_use_cases: Resolving health challenges for employees and families
Resolving life challenges for employees and families
Offering consulting services for employee well-being
competitive_advantages: One of the world's largest EAP providers
Extensive global reach supporting over 20,000 organizations and 20 million individuals
Access to local expert support and consultation
roi_benefits: Support for employees and families to resolve work, health, and life challenges
Improved quality of life for individuals
